Affordable Consulting & Website Design Pricing

Whether you need digital consulting, blogging help, podcast setup guidance, or a new website design, let's find the best approach for your goals. All engagements begin with a free Discovery Call.

Strategy Session

$45

An affordable, focused 1-hour call ideal for planning specific projects, launching new channels/podcasts, or conducting channel audits.

  • In-depth analysis of one key area.
  • Actionable plan for a specific goal.
  • Perfect for one-off strategic needs.
  • Gain clarity and direction quickly.
Book Free Call

Growth Accelerator

$250 / month

Ongoing digital consulting with 2x 1-hour calls per month, laser-focused on your specific content goals (YouTube, podcast, blog) and challenges.

  • Consistent support & accountability.
  • Deep dives into strategy & performance.
  • Adaptable to your evolving needs.
  • Priority access for questions.
  • Build momentum month over month.
Book Free Call

Custom Project

Custom

Bespoke solutions for significant undertakings like course creation, complex content strategies, team workshops, or advanced podcast setup.

  • Tailored scope and deliverables.
  • Dedicated project management.
  • Ideal for complex or large-scale goals.
  • Starts with a Discovery Call.
  • Let's create something impactful.
Book Free Call

One-Page Website Design

$1000 + yearly domain fee

A professional single-page site perfect for landing pages, lead generation, or establishing your online presence. Simple website design solution.

  • Clean, modern design.
  • Contact form integration.
  • Basic SEO setup.
  • Domain connection assistance.
  • You cover the annual domain cost.
Book Free Call

Multi-Page Website Design

$1500+ + yearly domain fee

For businesses needing more than one page (e.g., About, Services, Blog). Price varies based on complexity. Full website design service.

  • No bulky plugins, no hosting fees.
  • Multiple page design & build.
  • Expanded content sections.
  • Scalable for future growth.
  • Great for Small Business/Membership Sites
Book Free Call
Have a question?

Website Maintenance: Limited monthly retainers ($200/month) are available for ongoing site management after the initial build. Please inquire during your Discovery Call.
